title: 2 bedroom 2 bath Berwyn
map_address: 3121 S Harlem Ave near Harlem and 31st
posting_body: ['Berwyn, in the heart of Beautiful Berwyn this spacious 2 bedroom 2 baths 3rd floor apartment is available.', ' May 1, 2021.', ' This apartment is full of natural sunlight with sky lights.', ' The flooring is new and the kitchen is completely updated with new stainless steel appliances, and granite counter tops and a new sink.', ' Both bedrooms are large enough to accommodate your queen beds.', ' There is a master bath with shower and a full bath with a tub.', ' The closets are spacious.', ' Sunny natural lightening will brighten your day.', ' Efficient heat and flexicore building creates a sound proof unit.', ' You have central AC to keep you cool in the summer days.', ' The balcony off the living room overs a place to relax.', 'Off street parking on paved lot in back.', 'Shared laundry', 'This location is a commuters dream!', ' Walk 5 blocks to Metra BNSF and be downtown to Unions Station in 26 minutes.', ' Convenient to Eisenhower expressway (I 290), Stevenson expressway (I 55) via Harlem Ave.', 'Local hospitals near by: Loyola and MacNeal.', 'Convenient shopping is just 5 to 10 minutes away at Riverside Shopping with a Costco close by as well.', 'Financials: Rent $1650', 'Move in fee: $650', 'Credit check: $25.00', 'Tenant pays heat and electric']
